website_summaries.verdict: This faucet seems convenient with two separate sensors on the back and the top of the neck, yet the temperature has to be controlled under the sink.
pros: It installs very easily, can run on either batteries or electricity, and features an auto shutoff
cons: The sensors are touchy, and water can turn on when reaching across the sink

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but has some minuses
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful faucet but I have two issues with it. First, the pull down head is plastic, not metal like the rest of the fixture. While it matches the body in appearance, it cheapens the feel of the product. It makes me wonder how long it will last. Second, the power boost button only works one way. Once power boost is activated, the only way to go back to regular stream is to turn the water completely off and back on again. At first I thought my faucet was defective but I called the manufacturer and they confirmed that it's actually a feature and not a defect. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Alina B.

customer_reviews.title: Really attractive, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great faucet because it is solid brass construction, no plastic parts like the ones you buy at the Home Improvement stores. It is really attractive. Amazon had a better price than I could find elsewhere. It is a perfect size, I dislike those gigantic faucets that are so trendy right now, so this is modern and up-to-date without being huge. I used it with the escutcheon (deck plate) to cover the 3 holes, but you could use it without if you have a single hole. FYI, there is a matching bar faucet that's just a bit smaller which I used on my island sink.
customer_reviews.author: TAC

customer_reviews.title: Has leaked four times in three years.
customer_reviews.text: The cartridge in this faucet has failed four times in three years. I bought this faucet because I have two Moen shower faucets that are over thirty years old and have not leaked once. So the problem is not my water system or that Moen doesn't know how to make faucets that don't leak. Yes, Moen will send me a new cartridge but as other reviewers have stated they will not accept responsibility for water damage done. It is too bad that the leadership at a company like Moen is not held responsible for continuing to market products that they know are defective.
customer_reviews.author: Crusher

customer_reviews.title: Bad parts
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the faucet is all the way on (see picture). I've done one warranty exchange for the faucet valve where the original valve lost pressure and rubber started coming through the stream. The second valve has now failed (lasted 1.5 months) and I've lost pressure again. It's a real pain in the neck. I'm not hard on turning it off and on and I don't do it an extreme amount.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: ORB color is a joke...
customer_reviews.text: This is the ORB that is akin to Venetian bronze, not black oil rubbed bronze. It’s brown. Like deep copper brown with bright brown flecks. So mad that the industry cannot agreee on how to use a simple term?! Lowe’s website calls it: Mediterranean bronze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonhappy

customer_reviews.title: Great Faucet
customer_reviews.text: We really like this faucet. It is the look we want and it has the height for tall pans. The faucet has two water pressure abilities which is very nice - 1 for a light rinse and 2 for more pressure rinse. The nozzle extends as well to reach out to other areas of the sink for additional coverage of the faucet. Only weird thing is it drips for a few minutes after you shut the water off. I'm anticipating this is because of the long u to the spout and the hose, but it doesn't cause any issues. Overall, very satisfied with this faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: It retracts after use very smoothly.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a Moen faucet before this one and loved it. NOTE. There was nothing wrong with the last moen. We just remodeled. And I decided since I liked that handle on that faucet I would stay with that brand. I really LOVE this one . It is attractive and the hand held faucet fits well in your hand. I love the different pressures of the faucet buttons. It is a great asset to your kitchen needs. Be it filling pots with water or cleaning up after a meal. I can’t find anything wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille C Millhouse

customer_reviews.title: Ease of installation - weight for spray hose almost sufficient.
customer_reviews.text: Kudos to Moen for the installation instructions, it took less than 20 minutes to install - very impressive. I would agree with an earlier review on the spray head, it could be better quality. The motion sensor is sensitive so choose its placement well. The only negative is the weight for the hose. It is insufficient to pull the spray head fully back into the faucet (it’s close). There are no obstructions that would otherwise hamper its effectiveness. I’ll give it more breaking in time to see if it the stiffness of the hose works itself out. All in all, not bad.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: amazon home service installation
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Moen Faucet which is a great faucet and had amazon Home Services install it. After about 6 months i noticed the faucet was starting to move around on my kitchen countertop. I called Amson Home services about the problem to have them come out and was told it was out of the 90 day window on the installation. Make sure if the is a problem with installation, you catch it right away or you are stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: west4087

customer_reviews.title: Water savings and ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Water bill says it all; this tap meant we simply didn't leave the water on while doing other things (we were lazy I guess). My wife finds the motionsense difficult to get used to. (She uses the manual on/off when using hot water; I adjust the water after motionsense has activated the flow.) Installation was with Amazon (see review), which was great! I worried about constant power supply so bought the backup; no worries. Would have preferred cold to be vertical on the temperature selector rather than (an instrusive) horizontal. Happy we purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: RLW01 -- Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Nice Faucet But Messier
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older faucet during a countertop upgrade. I like the style of this faucet and was looking forward to having a sprayer again. This faucet fit all the criteria and works well. Easy to turn on and off, handle seems sturdy. I dinged it one star mostly because the sprayer unit sprays too hard and makes a lot of splatter when used. It does spray more softly but requires some fiddling with the faucet handle to make a slower flow. Otherwise, looks nice and seems like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Deb D

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Had some problems with it turning on originally Mohon wasn’t much help but figured it out and so far has been working great. **update*** This this is absolute trash. I’ve had it for less than a year and the control box went bad guess what when that happens it’s an expensive piece of junk. I called a plumber and was told this is very common with the motion sensor models. The part you need is $208 and Moen is the only one who sells it. It was cheaper and fast to replace it with a delta non sensor model save your money sounds cool but is just on problem after another.
customer_reviews.author: Desirae

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to find this Moen Faucet on sale, I have wanted an oil rubbed bronze faucet for many years to go along with my paprika colored sink. It also matches the hardware on my kitchen cabinets. The faucet I replaced was also a Moen that was 35 years old. Moen is quality and has an excellent warranty. I would recommend this faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Good company and warranty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this awhile ago. It was a great addition to our kitchen. I like that Moen offers warranties on their products. That being said; the handles on these loosen easily and the inside ‘strips’ so it’s now super loose. I’ll have to call for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: D. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and Brains!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this faucet. So has every single one of my friends who has seen it! Now I am getting more help cleaning up after parties, etc, as they want to play with it ! Really great if you've got messy hands, just need a splash of water. The accessory to plug it in rather than just use batteries didn't work on the outlet I had under the sink. The socket is also where the garbage disposal plugs in and works off the wall switch. To use it I'd have to leave the garbage disposal on continuously. Will likely re-route it if possible, but for now the batteries in it work great.
customer_reviews.author: DB in SD

customer_reviews.title: Innovation of the faucet I can use. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: One often wonders how a water faucet manufacturer can become more "innovative". Enter the motion sensor.... I'll be honest. It's still very early on. But, we are loving it. No more dirty hands on the surface of the faucet. No worrying about removing the onions or oil off your before trying to wash your hands...this is a great unit. The construction is solid and all parts were included. The stream is a bit off center (slightly elevated with a curved pour) but this is not a big deal. I read reviews indicating batteries go quickly. So, went ahead and bought the power adapter:  Keep you posted if things change...
customer_reviews.author: gb_ott

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Pretty simple installation
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Pretty simple installation. Convenient when you don't have a free hand to turn on the water. Be sure to follow the directions carefully. The sensor wires must be connected in a specific order. I would give it five stars but I'm having an issue with the stem. On occasion, I can't get hot water. I have to turn the handle from hot back to cold and to hot again. I need to contact Moen. Probably have a defective stem.
customer_reviews.author: David Ross

customer_reviews.title: Overall I love this faucet and would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love this faucet and would buy it again. My only complaints are that it did not come with the AC adapter so we had to use the battery option, and also that it occasionally turns on and off by itself when nobody is anywhere near the sink. My husband has a hard time with it because he always reaches into into the sink and sets off the motion sensor, but I don't have that problem because I am used to it and can easily avoid accidentally activating it. It makes me want to put motion sensor faucets in my bathrooms as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: We really like this faucet. It looks nice and I love the touchless aspect. We prefer using just the top sensor, but it was easy to disable the front one. Our only complaint would be the volume of water is less than our previous faucet, and you really can't adjust the flow. All in all, we happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: The Barts

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful faucet
customer_reviews.text: This faucet was all I was hoping for! It adds the perfect touch to my rustic kitchen. I love being able to turn it on and off without having to touch the faucet. Makes cooking and cleaning up easier. Husband had no trouble installing despite the fact he hates plumbing. We decided to purchase the adapter verses using batteries. Glad we did since I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this faucet
customer_reviews.text: We love this faucet; the extendable faucet-head with flexable hose makes cleaning the dishes before they go to the dishwasher a snap. They make this faucet in different finishes, as well as a motion-sensing device for those of us who are just too lazy to turn on/off a faucet. Personally, I chose the "manual" over the "automatic" for the calorie-burn not found in the automatic model, not to mention the likely-hood of a problem that would certainly develop when water comes into contact with the electric current that makes the faucet hands-free. All sarcasm aside...this is a GREAT product; I just have a hard time justifying the motion sensor thing........SERIOUSLY? ;-)
customer_reviews.author: 1Bruceman

customer_reviews.title: Faucet head does not retract back into the holder
customer_reviews.text: After paying the plumber to install two of these faucets, we realized that one of them didn't work as expected -- the faucet head does not retract back into the holder...unless you grab the hose from underneath the counter and pull it very hard. Not sure what to do since the plumber costs more than the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Thampiss

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great brand!
customer_reviews.text: This faucet replaced a similar one we had for 10 years. We're retired and cook a lot, so our faucet gets a heavy workout. We always loved the look and function of our last Moen faucet, so it was a no brainer to choose a Moen again. We have Moen faucets in our bathroom that were installed in 2003 and are still working like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Clark

customer_reviews.title: Wish we would have got this years ago
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this faucet. It has reduced the amount of water I am wiping up from the counter because people aren't using their wet hands to shut off the faucet. I was a little worried that I would have to change out the batteries a lot. But we are still using the batteries we put in almost 6 months ago. It would be hard to go back to a standard faucet after having this one.
customer_reviews.author: Brent D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the Moen is what is to be expected of a top of the line product. I did have it professionally installed since we had a new granite top replacement. It is beautiful, functionally sound and a perfect fit. We also bought the soap dispenser. Now is the test on longevity. I found other reviews in this area helpful. Potential problems mentioned was the sensor not working properly. I don't know, so we are hoping to not have that problem. So the actuals are at this point very good and we would definetly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Electronics died almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: One day in and the electronic box wouldn't let any cold water through. 2 days later there is no water coming out at all. The customer service line won't let you stay on hold, instead sends you to the callback option and the earliest callback is a full week. So no I have no functioning sink I'm my kitchen. I wanted this to work to help cut down on my water usage, I'll stick to old school faucets from now on. It was easy to install and worked great for 2 hours, now I have a $400 piece of useless kitchen art
customer_reviews.author: Trailer Editor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this faucet as a replacement for my 14 year old one in the kitchen sink. It looks beautiful and works well. I have had many compliments on it. One neighbor has faucet-envy because she wanted a touchless and her husband wouldn't buy her one, lol! I like this one so well, a few months later I bought an additional one to replace the smaller faucet in my prep sink. The only negative is that sometimes you don't want the faucet on but it senses you and pops on anyway. This has only happened a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Pamie

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and classy! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had it professionally installed but I will say that my contractor installed it quickly with no problem; all the parts were there and he mentioned that Moen has a LIFETIME WARRANTY for the homeowner! I have other Moen fixtures around the house and they work with no problem for years!~ and I am talking over 20+. What I like is the look of chrome and style, three different spray types, and the PRICE! It doesn't break the bank. It shipped in a day, too!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: High quality, sleek, great buy
customer_reviews.text: I had a nearly identical faucet from a cheaper brand that broke 3 times in the 4 years we had it so I bought this as an upgrade. The quality is immediately noticeable when you pull down the nozzle and let it retract. There is a heaviness and it moves smoothly and with ease. There is a button for a higher pressure flow which I now appreciate more than I initially did and if I’m splitting hairs, I wish there was a way to turn the feature off without having to turn the water off and back on. Overall, I’m very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Geegee

customer_reviews.title: We "like" our mown faucet but don't "love" it. ...
customer_reviews.text: We "like" our mown faucet but don't "love" it. About once a month I have to unplug it & reset/reboot it as it stops working. I am concerned about the heat it generates under the sink so I had to install a vent fan to keep heat & humidity down to try & prevent mold. Lastly, I wish there was some form of sensitivity control option on the sensor for quick hand rinse because after a manual reboot it is extra sensitive for a couple of weeks & then lessens. Given the amount of plastic parts it's a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Fabors

customer_reviews.title: Sensor broke after just one year - now we cant turn on water at all!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. The sensor stopped working after just one year, and now it wont even let us turn on the water manually! We replaced the batteries. We tried covering the sensor. Nothing works. This is a perfect example of a product getting to high-tech and just creating more parts that can brake. Trying to get a refund but who knows. STAY AWAY.
customer_reviews.author: Staza

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and performing faucet!
customer_reviews.text: We've had our Brantford Touchless faucet for about 2 weeks now and so far we're very happy with its performance. It is a challenge to get use to a new way of approaching your sink and doing dishes but getting easier every day. The only downside for me so far is that you always need to think about how the faucet is positioned during wipe down or you'll find yourself with a wet arm or shirt sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: It looks wonderful and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Plumber installed this today and said it is a very high-quality faucet that he heartily recommends. It looks wonderful and works perfectly: sprayer sprays very well and pull-down section retracts with ease. Faucet comes with a heavy weight to assure such retraction, by the way. Totally and entirely elated with this purchase - and the quick delivery, as well.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Motion sensor didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in July 2019 in preparation for a kitchen remodel. The faucet didn't get installed until the end of October 2019, at which time the plumber discovered that one of the motion sensors does not work. Unfortunately, the return window for Amazon has long past. $400+ down the drain! I have no choice but to order a new one and hope that it works. Very unfortunate!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Crawford

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this when we sid a kitchen remodel and it is PERFECT!! I love that itbhas 2 sensors, one is for handwashing and the other is to fill. I love that when I am baking and have goo all over my hands I do not have to touch the sink handle. It works great!!
customer_reviews.author: marian

customer_reviews.title: Nice design. Good look. Happy about purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had trouble installing the first one. The installation was more difficult because of all the things underneath the sink and counter. Wouldnt work. Moen sent a second Faucet but we think it was just the controller that was broken. Very happy now that it’s working.
customer_reviews.author: R Cain

customer_reviews.title: Touchless is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is so much better than what I had before! Everything works great & as it should. The only one issue l, which is not that bad, is when you press the button on the faucet head to have it spray, it sprays everywhere. Learned to direct spray down lower into the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy A Amick

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. We've only used for a couple weeksas of now. Easy to install. The color is very close to the brushed nickel look. I have a brush nickel soap dispenser next to it and it may be a slight shade off, but not to much to tell a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, good value for money spent
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is gorgeous and excellent quality. Installed easily. I will order the ac adapter for it. We all love the motion sensor and the Faucet stays clean because of it. Matches my kitchen perfectly. Definitely worth the money for the high quality hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet
customer_reviews.text: Love this faucet! The motion sensor takes a little getting used to but I love this feature. The quality is excellent. The finish is different than most oil rubbed bronze. I will attach a picture. I wasn't going to spend the extra on motion sensor but it was worth it. Would buy again. The picture had a flash, it is darker than the picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Pankow

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: A friend’s purchased locally in Omaha works way better. I am not sure if this was a lower quality version for reduced cost online sale. The sensor in front seems aimed way too low. It seems to turn on when far away and very low but not when your hand or item is right in front of the faucet. This is frustrating. Also, if the power goes out (I use the wall plug) the manual pull handle is also out of commission.
customer_reviews.author: mikeg261

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Put this faucet in my new kitchen last week. The contractor was very impressed with how it works so smoothly and easily. I agree. I purchased another manufacturer"s faucet previously for double the price and returned it when I saw it because it was huge and not made very well. So glad I went with the Moen. It is much smaller and perfect for my new kitchen. I'm totally impressed with it. It has worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Swanson

customer_reviews.title: I don't write a lot of reviews but just had to on this one!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly convenient! I love this faucet. My 8 year old is barely tall enough to reach the handle so he just waves his hands and voila! We are moving to a new house and I will definitely buy this for our new house. I love not having to touch the handle. The only downside is when you accidentally activate the sensor in the front. But it is comical when you do (and especially when others don't know!). Love love love this faucet!
customer_reviews.author: MKAtlanta

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I love this beautiful faucet! I almost returned it because my dishwasher broke right after I ordered it but I'm so glad I didn't. It makes my kitchen look beautiful and it is so well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Schultz

customer_reviews.title: SUPER EXCITED about this faucet
customer_reviews.text: SUPER EXCITED about this faucet. Just received and will be installing shortly. Husband loves to cook and I am a germaphobe - so this is a great tool to keep raw chicken off the handles and me happy without disinfecting while he cooks. And the Brantford design will be perfect in our traditional kitchen - so any of these faucets have a modern look. Ordered the plug in to avoid having to do batteries, also ordered matching bar faucet. Thank Moen for making great design choices!
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie

customer_reviews.title: Best faucet I didn't know I needed!
customer_reviews.text: After much research, we decided on this faucet to replace a broken pull out style installed by our builder. What a difference it makes in the kitchen! We are so pleased with the style and function. Our faucet arrived in great working condition with all parts. My husband easily installed it in a short amount of time. As another reviewer mentioned, removing the old faucet took longer than installing this one. I'm happy our other faucet broke! I didn't know how much I would enjoy a new hands free, pull down Moen faucet! The stainless steel color matches our stainless steel appliances and sink perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: GingerM

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect faucet
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install thanks to supply hoses that are already attached and the inclusion of a tool to easily secure the faucet from below. Looks great and the option for extra water is a cool feature. Only downside is that it always reverts to the stream mode when you turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: DVAB

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this faucet!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think they have worked all the bugs out!! Neat concept but my plumber hooked up the faucet and could never get it to work. It just randomly turn on and off. The faucet was unhooked and restarted several times. The motion sensors never worked. So I replaced it with a delta non motion sensor faucet. And love it!! Bummed that it wouldn’t work. 😩 so unless you want to look like this emoji. Don’t buy it!! Way over priced!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This faucet has been beyond amazing. My in-laws have bought some crap faucets when ...
customer_reviews.text: This faucet has been beyond amazing. My in-laws have bought some crap faucets when they built their house. This faucet is still going strong, and looks fabulous. It is 5 years old and looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: keenie82

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the extra money if you ask me to have the motionsense function. We turned off the front sensor so only the top one works. Found the front sensor annoying. I don’t know if it’s mentioned anywhere but this Faucet has a auto shut off to save water. The color is lighter than old rubbed bronze, but doesn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L. Shives

customer_reviews.title: Miss-matched finish
customer_reviews.text: This may have been a second rate product. I sent it back. The head and the handle were a different finish than the base and neck. The head also seemed to be cheap I didn't compare to something in a store but it was very light weight and didn't seem to be great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Amazon Prime

customer_reviews.title: Faucet.
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best faucet ever! I was hesitant to get this at first because it is expensive and I wasn't sure how good it would work. I love not having to touch the handles when my hands are dirty. I can control if I want a short burst of water or constant water flow with a sensor. It also looks amazing and very high quality in my newly remodeled kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean

customer_reviews.title: Loose faucet
customer_reviews.text: It’s great except it only came with one way to mount this faucet instead of the TWO they have pictured. Obviously mine is the later of the two. Entire fixture needs tightening every few days.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Buy this faucet now!
customer_reviews.text: I feel weird gushing about a kitchen faucet but....this is the best faucet I've had yet. Also I installed it myself, a 53 yr old grandma by the way. You won't regret buying this faucet, it works smoothly and I love the way the spray head swivels so you don't have to bend the hose to get under things to rinse them. All the features described for this faucet work perfectly. I did not get the motion on/off option so I cannot review that but I don't feel it needs it anyway. Buy this faucet!
customer_reviews.author: Katy A.

customer_reviews.title: Great, but sensitive temperature dial
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful and easy to use. The only issue I see is that it’s either scalding hot, or really cold. It’s hard to get a warm or lukewarm temp... but that may be my own water issue. The temperature control dial isn’t very big so I think it may be super sensitive to the smallest movements. Other than that, I love it! The sensor is very responsive and comes in handy when your hands are really dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased with MOEN
customer_reviews.text: We love this faucet. It’s been installed for about 4 months now and still works and looks flawless. I’m a big MOEN fan after this faucet and will continue to buy their products. When you unbox this thing you can just tell that you’ve purchased something of high quality. You really get what you pay for here.
customer_reviews.author: G Bizzle

customer_reviews.title: Functional beauty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful faucet. Water saver feature in that when initially turned on it’s a lower flow , press a button for vigorous water flow. Beauty and function A plumber installed it as we were having various plumbing repairs
customer_reviews.author: k sees

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely beautiful.  So decorative and shows off our new granite sink beautifully
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful kitchen faucet. We just had it installed a few days ago. Will contact the company because there is a slight drip after you turn the faucet off.
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: Loving the No Touch Motion Sensor!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this faucet. The No Touch motion sensor is so convenient and easy to use. I will never fo back to a regular kitchen faucet. I usually purchase Kohler, but thought I would try Moen, I am pleased with the quality. Love that it doesn't show fingerprints! Quality, convenience and a great Amazon price as usual. I also used the service provider and reviewed that separately...Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Faucet came on time and easy to install. I had a plumber install the faucet but he said my husband could do it easily. Love, love this faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Baldari

customer_reviews.title: We really like this faucet
customer_reviews.text: We really like this faucet. For an existing installed sink you will need hands on to to hold it in place while tightening the single nut. Had ours now a couple of weeks and we also got the add-on plastic shield under the sink for the pull out hose, keeps it from getting hung up on the lower valves. Good price good value easier install
customer_reviews.author: J. Talley

customer_reviews.title: Leaked right away
customer_reviews.text: This product has leaked since the first month, after being installed by a licensed plumber. Poor quality. Read similar reviews. I was hoping I'd get quality for money spent, but those days seem long gone. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nina B

customer_reviews.title: Yes and No
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this. I sometimes love the lower turn-on sensor, like when I want to quickly wash my hands. But every time I reach for something, like the sponge, I get wet up to my elbows and then hate it. The battery gave out after a few months, so now I like it better. I think the Touch-2-O would be a better choice. Too late for me now.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Pitcock

customer_reviews.title: Great Faucet!
customer_reviews.text: My son had bought this faucet for his kitchen and really liked it, so I needed one and purchased the same one. It was very easy to install and my wife loves it. Worth every penny I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Nice but feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but the materials feel cheap. It looks so good but the faucet feels so light. I expected when paying $250 +\- that the ’brass’ part of this and the Moen brand would have felt more solid.
customer_reviews.author: Cris C. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I had a plumber install, so I can’t really comment on that. The sensor works great. I love how I rarely have to wipe water up from behind the faucet anymore because of the hands free as well and there’s never any water marks to wipe off the faucet either. I’m thrilled with it!
customer_reviews.author: SJL1972

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!! Water flow ridiculous!
customer_reviews.text: The water flow on this faucet is unacceptably low. It takes forever to fill even a small pot with with water -- forget the time to wash up just a few dishes!! I must replace mine and can not reach Moen to address the problem. The faucet looks great but DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Ena

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet, a little expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Love this faucet. I had two in my other house and now have two in my new house. Like the water boost feature use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived defective. Worked with Moen directly for nearly 8 months to get replacement parts and schedule appointments with a professional plumber to install (during lockdowns) and finally was instructed to return to Amazon. Received a partial refund, so 8 months of hassle cost me $50. Great.
customer_reviews.author: painmd87

customer_reviews.title: Faucet
customer_reviews.text: Great faucet, so far so good! Very convenient for small kids who can just wave in front of it and wash messy hands. I love that I don't have to touch it when I am dealing with meat especially and there no water stains around it on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should and looks good too, don't waste your time (I did) on cheap lookalikes. This is not a flimsy faucet, strong and much better than the cheapie.
customer_reviews.author: sky

customer_reviews.title: This is the faucet of the future!
customer_reviews.text: I like the premise of the sensor but am finding there is learning curve that I haven't mastered. I don't blame the faucet but rather the user. I'm sure once I get a a handle on it I'll love it. I'd like the short flow that automatically turns off to be a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: stephen moses

customer_reviews.title: The best motion sensor faucet!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing. I did a lot of research. This was rated the best by most reviews. Works perfect. Had installed by plumber.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: The insides became loose after just a couple of months. It was not the replaceable cartridge either. Moen was very cooperative, they sent me a new one. Other than that, it works fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: RVB700

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: There were some negative comments written about this product. I am happy to tell you they are not accurate. I am a very handy person but plumbing and faucets in tight spaces are not my thing. This faucet I HIGHLY recommend. The directions are excellent. The ease of installation is ridiculously easy. The product looks great and the ease of use, Outstanding! Great product, great price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kent A Ravaioli

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and functionals well...
customer_reviews.text: Love this kitchen sink faucet. Style is unique and goes well with my kitchen. Spray head has an extra button for increase water pressure, it’s a very nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Guerrette

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves this in our kitchen. Installation was pretty simple and straightforward. Everything comes already assembled and you basically just need to hook up the hot and cold water lines and then you are set. The sprayer works great and retreats back to the base position quickly after you have pulled it out for use. I hope that this will last as long as our last Moen faucet lasted, which was well over 10 years. We are very happy with this and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Great faucet that looks stunning in chrome. I love the way it adjusts pressure in both shower and straight-stream mode. Moen is known for quality, and this faucet gets high marks.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: They look beautiful. They were easily installed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased & installed two of these in a house I'm building. One for the laundry and the other in the kitchen. They look beautiful. They were easily installed, they have a nice weight. I always feel comfortable purchasing Moen products.
customer_reviews.author: Kel A

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful faucet and works well
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful faucet and works well. I liked it so much I bought two more. I am short so we cut an 8" length of chrome colored shower curtain rod with the silver end cap on one end to extend the handle and make it easier for me to reach. I wrapped the original faucet handle underneath with tiny bubble, bubble wrap so it would not be damaged before sliding on the "handle extension". I have this faucet at home, in my office kitchen and in a rental apartment I have. The plumber easily installed each of them.
customer_reviews.author: Rescue The Cats

customer_reviews.title: Newly installed but love it so far.
customer_reviews.text: I loved not having to touch the handle with raw meat hands. I'm going to really enjoy this faucet!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hammersley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful. Very nicely made. Color is gorgeous. The price was AMAZING. Over $100.00 less than Lowe's or Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Goes very well with our sink and kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I really like this faucet. Our sink area is not cluttered with a lot of gadgets for a faucet. It is simple in design, but functions very well. I really like the pull down hose from the main unit and having the "button" to switch between regular flow and spray makes this a great unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ex Texan

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with my new farmhouse sink. Beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying this faucet
customer_reviews.text: I’m so enjoying this faucet! Easy pull for cleaning out the sink. Sprayer works well and has a setting for higher pressure which is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Sartin

customer_reviews.title: I expected more, given the high price
customer_reviews.text: The faucet doesn’t rotate to the right as much as it rotates to the left, rendering it difficult to fill water bottles and bowls in the right sink. Furthermore, the motion sensor to the left of the handle always turns the water on when we use the handle to turn the water off! Will be returning this faucet for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Stunning looks, smooth function
customer_reviews.text: While this cost as much as a low end appliance I think it's absolutely worth it. Even my husband gets into using the touchless feature. Smooth functioning and absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Getchell

customer_reviews.title: You ask really dumb questions.
customer_reviews.text: What do you think I'd use a kitchen faucet for?? That's a really dumb question to ask and with that I'm done with this review.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and a cool toy that comes in really handy when your hands are full.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to find that this is battery operated. There is a separate power supply available, but it must be purchased separately. The sensors work pretty well, but not perfectly (otherwise I would have given it 5 stars). I really like the appearance, the ability to turn the water on when my hands are full and the pull out sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory P. Alford

customer_reviews.title: Luv it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best faucet ever! Luv it. The plumber installed it but I had to read the instructions and set up the hands free activation part as he was baffled. The only down side is I now expect my bathroom faucets to be hands free (and they are not, yet).
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: A must for your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely live this addition to my kitchen. Keeps my faucet clean and free of gunk when my hands are dirty, especially while handling raw chicken. Great fit my kids as who can't reach the faucet handle but cannot use the kitchen sink. Love they there is a 2 minute limit on the top sensor to prevent accidentally leaving the water running.
customer_reviews.author: M. Park

customer_reviews.title: Excellent power spray
customer_reviews.text: Plumber installed faucet and it had a loose rotating spout. Called Moen and they were happy to send a new spout kit, but plumber returned and found that the problem was a loose internal fixture onto which the spout slides. He tightened the internal part and reinstalled the spout. Now everything works great. This was a problem with the original assembly by Moen. Probably a rare problem. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two facuets. This unit looked to have good quality; however, we returned because we preferred style of another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mon Valley

customer_reviews.title: Like functional jewelry for my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this faucet. I actually was shopping for a touch faucet when I stumbled upon this hands free one on Amazon for less than the others I was considering. I have a touchless faucet (different brand) in our guest bathroom and find it to be cleaner and more convenient. I was thrilled to find an affordable one for my kitchen. Not only is it clean and easy to use, but it is also pretty! I would recommend this to anyone considering any type of automated faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I used it to replace a kitchen faucet that was stuck in the spray mode. I like the looks and function, but am still not used to the handle to turn it on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome faucet
customer_reviews.text: This faucet was the finishing touch our kitchen needed to modernize it. We bought a power adapter for $10 from amazon (off brand) & it works wonderfully! We had the faucet professionally installed with our new sink and instant hot water. Love the spot resistant finish and the 2 sensors. Easy to wash hands ... just enough water.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and nice quality, sensor works great, the misses love it
customer_reviews.author: Steve F.

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint the nozzle doesn't retract all the way ...
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint the nozzle doesn't retract all the way an you see a small chrome ring. Yea you can push the nozzle up for a flush fit, but the chrome part should be the same color as the faucet in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Norman E

customer_reviews.title: Great Faucet
customer_reviews.text: Great faucet and an easy install. Love the look! Up date: 9/16/17, Had this now for six months and it is even better then I thought. Love the spray and how it operates. Don't see this breaking any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kitchen faucet looks & works great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design. Easy to install. Looks and works great. The Amazon price made it a great purchase! Ended at less then half the retail price. Would definitely recommend pu
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H. Klein

product_meta.title: Moen 7185EORB Brantford Motionsense Two-Sensor Touchless One-Handle High Arc Pulldown Kitchen Faucet Featuring Reflex, Oil-Rubbed Bronze
product_meta.description:
Color:Oil-Rubbed Bronze| Style:Two SensorAn oil rubbed bronze kitchen faucet that can do it all—this Moen touchless kitchen faucet has MotionSense technology that senses when you want water and when you don’t. Brantford’s kitchen faucet motion sensor is the ultimate hands-free faucet, providing a pull-down wand with self-retracting hose for ultimate flexibility and convenience.Pause function lets you conveniently stop water flow from the spray head; powerful rinse for heavy-duty cleaning; aerated stream for everyday cleaning.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
MotionSense provides the convenience of having a kitchen faucet that can literally sense what you're trying to accomplish and respond to what you need, the moment you need it. That's because MotionSense activates flow based on simple hand movements. This convenient, hands–free control assists in accomplishing routine tasks with greater speed and efficiency. MotionSense is now available on faucets in our traditionally styled Brantford collection.
feature_bullets: UNIQUE FINISH: Oil-Rubbed Bronze finish delivers a rich, dark brown, Old World finish with striking light and dark accents
TWO SENSORS: MotionSense delivers exceptional hands-free touchless convenience with double sensors, allowing a simple hand movement to trigger the flow of water
POWER CLEAN: Power Clean spray technology provides 50 percent more spray power versus most of our pulldown and pullout faucets without the Power Clean technology
RETRACTABLE: Equipped with the Reflex system for smooth operation, easy movement and secure docking of the spray head
EASY TO INSTALL: Features Duralock quick connect system for easy installation
FLEXIBLE DESIGN: Designed to be installed through 1 or 3 holes; escutcheon included
ADA COMPLIANT: Complies with Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) specifications
BUILT TO LAST: Backed by Moen’s Limited Lifetime Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,244 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
